Name: 守护传说 Guardian Legend
About the game: SUMMARY The story begins in a quiet little village. Wind and parents had a peaceful life here. But in order to prevent the devil from resurrection, Wind resolutely sets foot on the road to destroy the magic crystal. Along the way he made friends and went on adventures. Finally he destroyed the magic crystal and harvest an accident... FEATURES Q version of the characters and lovely nostalgic painting style scenes. Let you feel like being in a fairy tale world. The light-hearted plot and humorous dialogue keep you fully engaged. It allows you to move to another world and relax. Full and complete. The seven scenes include villages, fields, towns, caves, islands, castles, and forests. Let you experience the fun of riding on these adventures. In addition, you can experience the fun of catching fish. Set hidden items,.Remember to visit every room.You'll find amazing things. Traditional turn-based RPG. Horizontal versus; Operating support mouse, keyboard and handle.
